Package org.mellowtech.core.cache

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Loader<A,B>
    The Remover is used as the remover function when the various caches remove a key/value from their cache.
    Remover<K,V>
    The Remover is used as the remover function when the various caches remove a key/value from their cache.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCache<K,V>
    Generic model for caches.
    CacheLRU<K,V>
    Simple cache that use the least resently used scheme.
